meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jeff Dufour Lanny Timan Joe Koster Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6226.

td.p: Jeff Dufour, an online editor from Washington, D.C.
Lanny Timan, a business manager from Chicago, Illinois
Joe Koster, a telephone technician from Pelham, New Hampshire (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,201)

tr.td: THE Is HAVE IT
THE LAND OF THE BIBLE
NAME DROPPING AT THE MALL
FATS
"CARB"S
PRO TEENS

tr.td: Joe
Lanny
Jeff
YOU'VE GOT THE WRITE STUFF, JAMES
GEORGIA GIRL
COLLEGE KNOWLEDGE
WORD DERIVATIONS
ON A LAST-NAME BASIS
(Alex: And we will need the last name from you.)
COUNTRIES OF AFRIC"A"
(Alex: Each country will end with the letter "A".)

$4,001
\"God Save The Queen\"')
